NewsArticle.Title: Resets
NewsArticle.Content:
Due to difficulty of the Dark Aislings, any Aisling that died and lost their death piles because of this may request a reset. Only deaths that occured before 8:10pm pst (March 7)in the Battle Fields will be reset. Please email da-play@nexon.net. Your characters will either be reset to the day before or the morning of the death. Sorry for any inconvenience.
DA Team
